messages.subject: Fw: OT, EMAIL FRAUD!
messages.msgSnippet: ******WARNING****** This is a REAL email that we recieved this morning.  We called amazon.com and they said that this is totally fraudulant, and that they have
messages.messageBody:
******WARNING******
This is a REAL email that we recieved this morning. We called amazon.com
and they said that this is totally fraudulant, and that they have recieved 4
other calls about this already. Keep a look out for this kind of email,
they are trying to get your credit card info. It is a FAKE gift
certificate!!! Pass this along to others so they know not to be taken by
this email!

Thank you
Christine


> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <service@...>
> To: <spidermoon@...>
> Sent: Sunday, June 14, 1998 3:21 AM
> Subject: Amazon.com gift certificate!
>
>
> > Hello from Amazon.com!
> >
> > We have good news for you. The followinh person has just send you
> > $300 gift certificate.
> >
>
> -------------------------------------------------------------------------
> > Name: Mister X
> > Message: As I promised.
> > Gift certificate number: 12654321
> > Exp. date: 07.14.99
> > ID number: 1x233cer
> > ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> >
> > You can use this certificate to buy anything you want from a
> > mazon.com For your conveniences, we also can transfer this
> > money on your credit card account. If you want to do this you
> > should fill in the following table and email it back to
> > service@... or fax it to (603) 462-6932.
> >
> >
>
****************************************************************************
> **
> > Certificate Number:
> > Certificate Exp. Date:
> > Your Email address:
> > ID Number:
> > Country:
> > First Name:
> > Last Name:
> > Address:
> > City:
> > State (USA only):
> > Zip/Postal Code:
> > Evening Phone No:
> > Daytime Phone No:
> > Name on Card:
> > Credit Card Type:
> > Expiration Date (09/99):
> > Bank Name:
> > Bank Phone Number:
> >
> > all data must be entered as on credit card or
> > we will be unable to transfer money.
> >
>
****************************************************************************
> *******************
> >
> > We think you would enjoy Amazon.
> > GoodLuck in shopping!
> >
> > Sincerely,
> > Amazon certificate manager,
> > Tomas Michaels
> >
> >
>
>
